title: Zendesk...

text: Introducing the world's first platform agnostic, omni-channel commerce solution built natively on Zendesk. We bringing the next generation of customer support experiences to retailers large and small.

title: Customer experience

text: Truly amazing purchase experiences aren't just about buying great products. The world's leading brands know that customer experience runs from initial contact through to dealing with issues to deliver exceptional support.

title: Agent experience
subtitle: without compromise.
text: Customer support agents are often as frustrated as consumers, having to re-enter in data across mutiple systems. We bring commerce data directly to their fingertips to better support your customers without playing "swivel chair".

title: Commerce
